definition: غليظ galīẓ pl. غلاظ thick (e.g., curtain, fabric); fat and uncouth, hulking, burly, gross (person, body); viscous, viscid, sirupy (liquid); solid, stringy, tough (food); coarse, crude (fabric, words, person); rough, rugged (ground); harsh, callous, rude, churlish, inconsiderate, boorish; inviolable, sacred (alliance, oath) │ غليظ الرقبة g. ar-raqaba stiff-necked, obdurate, obstinate, stubborn; المعى الغليظ (mi‘ā) the large intestine (anat.); يمين غليظة binding, sacred oath
